extensionHomepageUrl.description: URL of the Tanaguru.com english version.

extensionWebsite.message: To learn more, visit the site manifest.homepage_url.

extensionNewWindow.description: Text to inform that an element will open a new window.

msgDashboardResultFailed.message: Errors have been detected on this page.

msgDashboardResultPassed.message: No errors were detected on this page.

msgDashboardResultNone.message: There are no results matching your request for this page.

msgDashboardWarning.message: Warning, the url of the page has changed, the current analysis results no more match the content of the active tab.

dashboardButtonRestart.message: Exit and start a new analysis

dashboardListenDOMlegend.message: Monitor the DOM changes of the analyzed page

contrastDescription1.message: Text smaller than 24px, and text smaller than 18.5px with a fat effect of at least 700: minimum contrast ratio 4.5:1

contrastDescription2.message: Text larger than 24px, and text larger than 18.5px with a fat effect of at least 700: minimum contrast ratio 3:1

contrastWarning.message: A manual analysis is still required to confirm or deny the announced statuses (e.g. overlapping cases are not taken into account).
